title: Borderlands TPS Pre Sequel SPLITSCREEN Tool 2-4 players
description:
Thanks to IM.Distro for creating this and enabling splitscreen for Borderlands 2 and Borderlands The Pre-Sequel!

This tool supports 2-4 players using controllers or controllers + mouse/keyboard. If your PC is not very powerful, make sure to turn down/off graphics and PhysX settings!

This download includes the optional intro fix to skip the startup 2k & nvidia logo videos.

More info:
or https://splitplaypc.codeplex.com/releases/view/135502 <-- You can also check for new versions on the splitplaypc.codeplex.com site
